effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

short_effect.sword_shield: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.

short_effect.legends_arceus: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.sword_shield: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: A slashing attack with a toxic blade that may also poison the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
